title: Purdue announces $2 billion fundraising campaign
text:
Purdue announces fundraising campaign to raise $2 billion 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/11/15 2:42 pm EDT - Updated: 10/11/15 2:42 pm EDT 
WEST LAFAYETTE, Indiana â€” Purdue University has announced a fundraising campaign in the hopes of raising more than $2 billion. 
WISHTV.Com ( http://bit.ly/1P8ucEn ) reports that Purdue's president Mitch Daniels announced the campaign called "Ever True __ The Campaign for Purdue University" on Friday. He says the goal is to raise the money by the time Purdue celebrates its 150th anniversary on 2019. 
The school is off to a good start, having raised $900 million from 83,000 donors since the silent phase of the campaign began in 2012. 
But now the university is making a very public push. 
The school hopes to raise money for a number of initiatives, including as much as $500 million to expand research and as much as $500 million for scholarships and other student support aimed at ensuring Purdue remains affordable. 
Information from: WISH-TV, http://www.wishtv.com/
